hotels.title: Chic All-Suite Bangalore Retreat in Koramangala with Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Indulge in five-star luxury in the vibrant southeastern Koramangala neighbourhood of Bangalore. This urban oasis offers modern comforts, providing a peaceful escape. Savour traditional Indian cuisine at the onsite dining venues, relish a hot buffet breakfast to fuel your explorations and unwind in the outdoor pool or with a spa treatment. Enjoy a leisurely stroll through the captivating landscapes of nearby Mesthripalya Lake, marvel at the grandeur of Bangalore Palace or explore the bustling streets of Commercial Street for a unique shopping experience.

Dedicate some time to yourself with a massage at the onsite spa before trotting into the Bengaluru city centre to explore the local entertainment and cultural sites.
